trans-unit.source: The listener's position is described using right-hand Cartesian coordinates; its movement using a velocity vector and the direction the listener's head is pointing using two direction vectors: up and front. trans-unit.source: The main program shares with us the attribute aVertexPosition, which is the position of the vertex in whatever coordinate system it's using. We need to convert these values so that both components of the position are in the range -1.0 to 1.0. This can be done easily enough by multiplying by a scaling factor that's based on the context's aspect ratio. We'll see that computation shortly.
trans-unit.target: 主程序与我们共享属性 aVertexPosition ，这是顶点在其使用的任何坐标系中的位置。我们需要转换这些值，以便该位置的两个分量都在-1.0到1.0的范围内。通过乘以基于上下文的纵横比的缩放因子，可以很容易地做到这一点。我们将很快看到该计算。

trans-unit.source: The main steps to drag and drop are to define a drop zone (i.e. a target element for the file drop) and to define event handlers for the drop and dragover events. These steps are described below, including example code snippets. The full source code is available in MDN's drag-and-drop repository (pull requests and/or issues are welcome).
trans-unit.target: 拖放的主要步骤是定义放置区域（即文件放置的目标元素），并定义 drop 和 dragover 事件的事件处理程序。下面介绍这些步骤，包括示例代码段。完整的源代码可在MDN的拖放存储库中找到（欢迎提出请求和/或问题）。

trans-unit.source: The main thing you can't do in a Worker is directly affect the parent page. This includes manipulating the DOM and using that page's objects. You have to do it indirectly, by sending a message back to the main script via DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.postMessage, then actioning the changes from there.
trans-unit.target: 您无法在Worker中做的主要事情是直接影响父页面。这包括操作DOM和使用该页面的对象。您必须间接执行此操作，方法是通过 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.postMessage 将消息发送回主脚本，然后从那里执行更改。

trans-unit.source: The main thread of a Web browser is centered around its event loop. This code draws any pending updates to the Document currently being displayed, runs any JavaScript code the page needs to run, accepts events from input devices, and dispatches those events to the elements that should receive them. In addition, the event loop handles interactions with the operating system, updates to the browser's own user interface, and so forth. It's an extremely busy chunk of code, and your main JavaScript code may run right inside this thread along with all of this. Certainly most if not all code that is capable of making changes to the DOM is running in the main thread, since it's common for user interface changes to only be available to the main thread.
trans-unit.target: Web浏览器的主线程围绕其事件循环。此代码绘制当前正在显示的 Document 所有未决更新，运行该页面需要运行的所有JavaScript代码，接受来自输入设备的事件，并将这些事件分派给应该接收它们的元素。另外，事件循环处理与操作系统的交互，更新浏览器自己的用户界面，等等。这是一个非常繁忙的代码块，您的主要JavaScript代码可能会与所有这些代码一起直接在此线程内运行。当然，大多数（即使不是全部）能够更改DOM的代码都在主线程中运行，因为用户界面更改通常只对主线程可用。

trans-unit.source: The matrix that represents this transformation. The matrix object is live, meaning that any changes made to the SVGTransform object are immediately reflected in the matrix object and vice versa. In case the matrix object is changed directly (i.e., without using the methods on the SVGTransform interface itself) then the type of the SVGTransform changes to SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX.
trans-unit.target: 表示此转换的矩阵。矩阵对象处于活动状态，这意味着对 SVGTransform 对象所做的任何更改都会立即反映在矩阵对象中，反之亦然。在情况下，矩阵对象被直接改变（即，不使用在该方法 SVGTransform 接口本身）随后的类型 SVGTransform 变为 SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX 。

trans-unit.source: The maximum browser storage space is dynamic — it is based on your hard drive size. The global limit is calculated as 50% of free disk space. trans-unit.source: The mobile web contains two viewports, the layout viewport and the visual viewport. The layout viewport covers all the elements on a page and the visual viewport is what is actually visible on the screen. When the user pinch-zooms into the page, the visual viewport shrinks but the layout viewport is unchanged. User-interface features like the on-screen keyboard (OSK) can shrink the visual viewport without affecting the layout viewport.
trans-unit.target: 移动网络包含两个视口,布局视口和视觉视口。布局视口涵盖了页面上的所有元素,而视觉视口则是屏幕上实际可见的内容。当用户在页面中进行捏合缩放时,视觉视口会缩小,但布局视口不变。像屏幕键盘(OSK)这样的用户界面功能可以在不影响布局视口的情况下缩小视觉视口。

trans-unit.source: The mode for isolating access to data in the object stores that are in the scope of the transaction. For possible values, see the Constants section below. The default value is readonly.
trans-unit.target: 在事务范围内用于隔离对对象存储中数据的访问的模式。有关可能的值，请参见下面的“常量”部分。默认值为 readonly 。

trans-unit.source: The more nodes in a graph, the higher the latency will be. For example, if your graph has a latency of 500ms, when the source node plays a sound, it will take half a second until that sound can be heard on your speakers (or even longer because of latency in the underlying audio device). Therefore, if you need to have interactive audio, keep the graph as small as possible, and put user-controlled audio nodes at the end of a graph. For example, a volume control (GainNode) should be the last node so that volume changes take immediate effect.
trans-unit.target: 图中的节点越多，延迟将越高。例如，如果您的图形的延迟时间为500毫秒，则当源节点播放声音时，将需要半秒钟才能在扬声器上听到该声音（由于底层音频设备的延迟，甚至会更长）。因此，如果您需要交互式音频，请使图表尽可能小，并将用户控制的音频节点放在图表的末尾。例如，音量控件（ GainNode ）应该是最后一个节点，以便音量更改立即生效。

trans-unit.target: 条件的最合适的错误代码。有关可能的值，请参见错误代码。

trans-unit.source: The most frequently-used feature of the console is logging of text and other data. There are four categories of output you can generate, using the console.log(), console.info(), console.warn(), and console.error() methods respectively. Each of these results in output styled differently in the log, and you can use the filtering controls provided by your browser to only view the kinds of output that interest you.
trans-unit.target: 控制台最常用的功能是记录文本和其他数据。您可以生成四种输出类别，分别使用 console.log() ， console.info() ， console.warn() 和 console.error() 方法。这些结果中的每一个都会导致输出在日志中的样式不同，并且您可以使用浏览器提供的过滤控件来仅查看您感兴趣的输出类型。

trans-unit.source: The most important thing to note here is that the grid-column is set to 1, to place the sidebar on the left-hand side of the screen. If you change this to -1, it will appear on the right (although some other elements will need some adjustments made to their margins to get the spacing just right). The grid-row is set to 2, to place it alongside the site body.
trans-unit.target: 这里要注意的最重要的一点是，将 grid-column 设置为1，以将侧栏放置在屏幕的左侧。如果将其更改为-1，它将显示在右侧（尽管某些其他元素将需要对其边距进行一些调整才能使间距恰到好处）。该 grid-row 设置为2，将其放在旁边的身体部位。

trans-unit.source: The most important thing to understand before we get started is that even though we're only rendering a square plane object in this example, we're still drawing in 3D space. It's just we're drawing a square and we're putting it directly in front of the camera perpendicular to the view direction. We need to define the shaders that will create the color for our simple scene as well as draw our object. These will establish how the square plane appears on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 在我们开始之前,最重要的一点是,尽管我们在这个例子中只渲染了一个正方形的平面对象,但我们仍然是在3D空间中绘图。只是我们绘制了一个正方形,并将其直接放在与视图方向垂直的摄像机前。我们需要定义着色器,这些着色器将为我们的简单场景创建颜色,以及绘制我们的对象。这些将建立正方形平面在屏幕上的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: The most important thing to understand is that most constraints aren't requirements; instead, they're requests. There are exceptions, and we'll get to those shortly.
trans-unit.target: 最重要的一点是,大多数约束不是需求,而是请求。但也有例外,我们很快就会讲到。

trans-unit.source: The most obvious use of the connect() method is to direct the audio output from one node into the audio input of another node for further processing. For example, you might send the audio from a MediaElementAudioSourceNode—that is, the audio from an HTML5 media element such as <audio>—through a band pass filter implemented using a BiquadFilterNode to reduce noise before then sending the audio along to the speakers.
trans-unit.target: connect() 方法最明显的用途是将音频从一个节点输出到另一节点的音频输入中，以进行进一步处理。例如，您可以通过使用 BiquadFilterNode 实现的带通滤波器从 MediaElementAudioSourceNode 发送音频（即，来自 <audio> 之类的HTML5媒体元素的音频），以减少噪声，然后再将音频发送到扬声器。

trans-unit.source: The next change is to initTexture(), which becomes much simpler, since it no longer needs to load an image file. Instead, all it does is create an empty texture object, put a single pixel in it, and set its filtering for later use:
trans-unit.target: 下一个更改是 initTexture() ，它变得更加简单，因为它不再需要加载图像文件。相反，它所做的只是创建一个空的纹理对象，在其中放置一个像素，然后设置其过滤条件以备后用：

trans-unit.source: The next example creates a new RTCPeerConnection which will use a single TURN server which has multiple URLs. This is useful if the server is, for example, available both on "turn" and "turns" schemes, or if there's a fallback address available for the server.
trans-unit.target: 下一个示例创建一个新的 RTCPeerConnection ，它将使用具有多个URL 的单个TURN服务器。例如，如果服务器在“转弯”和“转弯”方案上均可用，或者服务器具有备用地址，则此功能很有用。

trans-unit.source: The next example logs an object to the console, with the object's fields expandable using disclosure widgets:
trans-unit.target: 下一个例子将一个对象记录到控制台,对象的字段可以使用披露小部件进行扩展。

trans-unit.source: The next example removes the first child node inside the element with the id "foo" if foo has child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果foo有子节点，则下一个示例删除ID为 "foo" 的元素内的第一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: The next example scans through all of the media's audio tracks, enabling any that are in the user's preferred language (taken from a variable userLanguage) and disabling any others.
trans-unit.target: 下一个示例扫描媒体的所有音频轨道，以用户喜欢的语言（从变量 userLanguage 中获取）中的任何一种启用，并禁用任何其他语言。

trans-unit.source: The next parameter is distanceModel — this can only be set to linear, inverse, or exponential. These are different algorithms, which are used to reduce the volume of the audio source as it moves away from the listener. We'll use linear, as it is simple:
trans-unit.target: 下一个参数是 distanceModel -只能设置为 linear ， inverse 或 exponential 。这些是不同的算法，用于减少音频源从听众移开时的音量。我们将使用 linear ，因为它很简单：

trans-unit.source: The next part of our code defines the grammar we want our app to recognise. The following variable is defined to hold our grammar:
trans-unit.target: 代码的下一部分定义了我们希望应用程序识别的语法。下面的变量被定义用来存放我们的语法。

trans-unit.source: The next rendering step involves:
trans-unit.target: 下一个渲染步骤涉及:

trans-unit.source: The next step is to connect the local peer to the remote by telling the remote peer about it. This is done by calling remoteConnection.RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription(). Now the remoteConnection knows about the connection that's being built.
trans-unit.target: 下一步是通过告诉本地对等方将其连接到远程。这是通过调用 remoteConnection. 完成的。 RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription() 。现在， remoteConnection 知道正在建立的连接。

trans-unit.source: The next step is to set up each connection with ICE candidate listeners; these will be called when there's a new ICE candidate to tell the other side about.
trans-unit.target: 下一步是为每个连接设置ICE候选监听器;当有新的ICE候选者要告诉对方时,这些监听器将被调用。

trans-unit.source: The next task is to get the media stream:
trans-unit.target: 接下来的任务是获取媒体流。

trans-unit.source: The next thing to do is define a speech recogntion instance to control the recognition for our application. This is done using the SpeechRecognition() constructor. We also create a new speech grammar list to contain our grammar, using the SpeechGrammarList() constructor.
trans-unit.target: 接下来要做的是定义语音识别实例，以控制对我们应用程序的识别。这是使用 SpeechRecognition() 构造函数完成的。我们还使用 SpeechGrammarList() 构造函数创建一个新的语音语法列表以包含我们的语法。

trans-unit.source: The next thing we do is to get the GamepadPose object for the controller stored in gpPose (by querying Gamepad.pose), and also store the current gamepad position and orientation for this frame in variables so they are easuy to access later. We also display the post stats for this frame in the DOM using the displayPoseStats() function. All of this is only done if gp actually has a value (if a gamepad is connected), which stops the demo erroring if we don't have our gamepad connected.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们要做的是获取存储在gpPose中的控制器的 GamepadPose 对象（通过查询 Gamepad.pose ），并将该框架当前的游戏手柄位置和方向存储在变量中，以便以后使用。我们还使用 displayPoseStats() 函数在DOM中显示此框架的后期统计。仅当 gp 实际上有一个值（如果连接了游戏手柄）时，所有这些操作才能完成；如果我们未连接游戏手柄，则这将停止演示错误。

trans-unit.source: The next transformation method is scaling. We use it to increase or decrease the units in our canvas grid. This can be used to draw scaled down or enlarged shapes and bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: 下一个变换方法是缩放。我们用它来增加或减少画布网格中的单位。这可以用来绘制缩小或放大的形状和位图。

trans-unit.source: The next type of paths available are Bézier curves, available in both cubic and quadratic varieties. These are generally used to draw complex organic shapes.
trans-unit.target: 可用的下一类路径是贝塞尔曲线，有三次和二次可用。这些通常用于绘制复杂的有机形状。

trans-unit.source: The next type of paths available are Bézier curves, available in both cubic and quadratic varieties. These are generally used to draw complex organic shapes.

trans-unit.target: 指针输入的归一化压力,范围为0~1,其中0和1分别代表硬件能够检测到的最小和最大压力。

trans-unit.source: The normalized pressure of the pointer input in the range of 0 to 1, where 0 and 1 represent the minimum and maximum pressure the hardware is capable of detecting, respectively. For hardware that does not support pressure, including but not limited to mouse, the value MUST be 0.5 when the pointer is active and 0 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 指针输入的归一化压力,范围为0到1,其中0和1分别代表硬件能够检测到的最小压力和最大压力,对于不支持压力的硬件,包括但不限于鼠标,该值必须为0.5,否则为0。对于不支持压力的硬件,包括但不限于鼠标,当指针处于活动状态时,该值必须为0.5,否则为0。

trans-unit.source: The notation name
trans-unit.target: 符号名称

trans-unit.source: The notification's data can be any arbitrary data that you want associated with the notification.
trans-unit.target: 通知的数据可以是任何你想与通知关联的任意数据。

trans-unit.source: The notification's timestamp can represent the time, in milliseconds since 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970, of the event for which the notification was created, or it can be an arbitrary timestamp that you want associated with the notification. For example, a timestamp for an upcoming meeting could be set in the future, whereas a timestamp for a missed message could be set in the past.
trans-unit.target: 通知的时间戳可以代表自1970年1月1日00:00:00 UTC以来的时间(以毫秒为单位),也可以是您希望与通知关联的任意时间戳。例如,一个即将到来的会议的时间戳可以设置在未来,而一个错过的消息的时间戳可以设置在过去。

trans-unit.source: The notifications API spec lists four events that are triggered on the Notification instance:
trans-unit.target: 通知API规范列出了在 Notification 实例上触发的四个事件：

trans-unit.source: The number of Touch objects in the TouchList.
trans-unit.target: TouchList 中 Touch 对象的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of logical processor cores is a way to measure the number of threads which can effectively be run at once without them having to share CPUs. Modern computers have multiple physical cores in their CPU (two or four cores is typical), but each physical core is also usually able to run more than one thread at a time using advanced scheduling techniques. So a four-core CPU may return 8. The browser may, however, choose to reduce the number in order to represent more accurately the number of Workers that can run at once
trans-unit.target: 逻辑处理器内核的数量是一种测量线程数量的方法，这些线程无需共享CPU即可立即有效运行。现代计算机的CPU中有多个物理核心（典型的是两个或四个核心），但每个物理核心通常也可以使用高级调度技术一次运行多个线程。因此，四核CPU可能返回8。但是，浏览器可以选择减少数量，以便更准确地表示可以一次运行的 Worker 的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of a device-specific configuration.
trans-unit.target: 特定设备配置的编号。

trans-unit.source: The number of a device-specific endpoint (buffer).
trans-unit.target: 特定设备端点(缓冲区)的编号。

trans-unit.source: The number of alternatives contained in the result depends on what the SpeechRecognition.maxAlternatives property was set to when the speech recognition was first initiated.
trans-unit.target: 结果中包含的替代项的数量取决于首次启动语音识别时将 SpeechRecognition.maxAlternatives 属性设置为什么。

trans-unit.source: The number of audio channels available on a signal is frequently presented in a numeric format, such as 2.0 or 5.1. This is called channel notation. The first number is the total number of audio channels that the signal includes. The number after the period indicates the number of those channels which are reserved for low-frequency effect (LFE) outputs; these are often referred to as subwoofers.
trans-unit.target: 信号上可用的音频通道数通常以数字格式表示，例如2.0或5.1。这称为通道符号。第一个数字是信号包含的音频通道的总数。句点后的数字表示为低频效果（LFE）输出保留的通道数。这些通常称为超低音扬声器。

trans-unit.source: The number of bits of precision that can be represented. For integer formats this value is always 0.
trans-unit.target: 可以表示的精度位数。对于整数格式,这个值总是0。

trans-unit.source: The number of bits used to hold the query result for the given target.
trans-unit.target: 用于保存给定目标的查询结果的位数。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of data currently queued to be sent over the data channel but have not yet been sent.
trans-unit.target: 当前排队等待通过数据通道发送但尚未发送的数据字节数。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of queued data.
trans-unit.target: 排队数据的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The number of channels in the input audio stream that you want to output separately; the default is 6 if this parameter is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 输入音频流中要单独输出的通道数;如果没有指定此参数,默认为6。

trans-unit.source: The number of channels in the input audio streams, which the output stream will contain; the default is 6 if this parameter is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 输入音频流中的通道数,输出流将包含这些通道;如果没有指定该参数,默认为6。

trans-unit.source: The number of channels is defined by the value of channelCount.
trans-unit.target: 通道数由 channelCount 的值定义。

trans-unit.source: The number of channels is equal to the maximum number of channels of all connections, clamped to the value of channelCount.
trans-unit.target: 通道数等于所有连接的最大通道数，固定为 channelCount 的值。

trans-unit.source: The number of channels is equal to the maximum number of channels of all connections. In this case, channelCount is ignored and only up-mixing happens.
trans-unit.target: 通道数等于所有连接的最大通道数。在这种情况下， channelCount 将被忽略，仅发生上混。

trans-unit.source: The number of child nodes from the start of the anchor node that should be excluded from the selection. So for example, if the value is 0 the whole node is included. If the value is 1, the whole node minus the first child node is included. And so on.
trans-unit.target: 从锚节点开始的子节点数量,应该从选择中排除。因此,例如,如果值为0,则包括整个节点。如果值为1,则包括整个节点减去第一个子节点。以此类推。

trans-unit.source: The number of child nodes from the start of the focus node that should be included in the selection. So for example, if the value is 0 the whole node is excluded. If the value is 1, the first child node is included. And so on.
trans-unit.target: 从焦点节点开始的子节点数量,这些子节点应该被包含在选择中。例如,如果值为0,则整个节点被排除。如果值是1,则包含第一个子节点。以此类推。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees downwards that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向下延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees downwards that the field of view will extend in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向下延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees of rotation to apply to the described ellipse to align with the contact area between the user and the touch surface.
trans-unit.target: 应用于所述椭圆的旋转度数,使其与用户和触摸表面之间的接触区域对齐。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees to the left that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向左延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees to the left that the field of view will extend in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向左延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees to the right that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向右延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees to the right that the field of view will extend in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向右延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees upwards that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向上延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees upwards that the field of view will extend in.
trans-unit.target: 视野向上延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The number of drag data items in the list, or 0 if the list is empty or disabled. The drag item list is considered to be disabled if the item list's DataTransfer object is not associated with a drag data store.
trans-unit.target: 列表中拖动数据项的数量；如果列表为空或禁用，则为0。如果项目列表的 DataTransfer 对象未与拖动数据存储关联，则认为该拖动项目列表已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: The number of filters does not specifiy the number of devices shown by the user agent. For example, if only a USB device with product ID 0xa800 is found, then only one device will be listed by the user agent. On the other hand if the user agent finds two of the first listed device and one of the second, then all three devices will be listed.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器的数量并不指定用户代理所显示的设备数量。例如,如果只找到一个产品ID为0xa800的USB设备,那么用户代理将只列出一个设备。另一方面,如果用户代理找到两个第一个列出的设备和一个第二个列出的设备,那么三个设备都会被列出。

trans-unit.source: The number of form controls within the <form>. This is the same as the number of the elements in the HTMLFormControlsCollection returned by the elements property.
trans-unit.target: <form> 中的表单控件数。这与 elements 属性返回的 HTMLFormControlsCollection 中的元素数相同。

trans-unit.source: The number of frames which have been
trans-unit.target: 帧数,已经

trans-unit.source: The number of input channels in the audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 音频流的输入通道数。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the array.
trans-unit.target: 阵列中的项目数。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的项目数。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds each iteration of the animation takes to complete. Defaults to 0. Although this is technically optional, keep in mind that your animation will not run if this value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 动画的每次迭代完成所需的毫秒数,默认值为0。默认值为0,虽然这在技术上是可选的,但请记住,如果这个值为0,你的动画将不会运行。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds long a single beginning-to-end iteration of the animation should take. The default is "auto". This value must not be negative; otherwise, it can have any value (including positive infinity).
trans-unit.target: 动画的从开始到结束的每次迭代应花费的毫秒数。默认值为 "auto" 。该值不能为负。否则，它可以具有任何值（包括正无穷大）。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds over which the browser may continue to attempt to transmit the message until it either succeeds or gives up. If not set when RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel() was called to create the data channel, this value is null.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器可以继续尝试传输消息直到成功或放弃的毫秒数。如果在 RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel() 创建数据通道时未设置，则此值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to delay after the end of an animation. This is primarily of use when sequencing animations based on the end time of another animation. Defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 动画结束后要延迟的毫秒数。主要用于根据另一个动画的结束时间对动画进行排序时。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to delay the start of the animation. Defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 延迟动画开始的毫秒数。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to record into each Blob. If this parameter isn't included, the entire media duration is recorded into a single Blob unless the requestData() method is called to obtain the Blob and trigger the creation of a new Blob into which the media continues to be recorded.
trans-unit.target: 要记录到每个 Blob 中的毫秒数。如果不包括此参数，则除非 requestData() 方法获取 Blob 并触发创建新的 Blob 并将媒体继续记录到其中，否则整个媒体持续时间都会记录到一个 Blob 中。

trans-unit.source: The number of nodes in the NodeList.
trans-unit.target: NodeList 中的节点数。

trans-unit.source: The number of output channels in the audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 音频流的输出通道数。

trans-unit.source: The number of plugins in the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的插件数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of properties. See the item() method below.
trans-unit.target: 属性数。请参见下面的 item() 方法。

trans-unit.source: The number of queued outgoing data bytes below which the buffer is considered to be "low."
trans-unit.target: 排队输出的数据字节数,低于此数的缓冲区被认为是 "低"。

trans-unit.source: The number of texture units is implementation dependent, you can get this number with the help of the MAX_COMBINED_TEXTURE_IMAGE_UNITS constant. It is, per specification, at least 8.
trans-unit.target: 纹理单元的数量取决于实现，您可以在 MAX_COMBINED_TEXTURE_IMAGE_UNITS 常量的帮助下获得该数量。根据规格，至少为8。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the animation should repeat. Defaults to 1, and can also take a value of Infinity to make it repeat for as long as the element exists.
trans-unit.target: 动画应重复的次数。默认值为 1 ，并且也可以采用 Infinity 的值，以使其重复一次，只要元素存在即可。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the receiver notified the sender that one or more RTP packets has been lost by sending a Negative ACKnowledgement (NACK, also called "Generic NACK") packet to the sender. This value is only available to the receiver.
trans-unit.target: 接收方通过向发送方发送一个消极的ACKnowledgegement(NACK,也叫 "通用NACK")数据包,通知发送方一个或多个RTP数据包丢失的次数。这个值只对接收方有效。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the receiver notified the sender that one or more consecutive (in scan order) encoded video macroblocks have been lost or corrupted; this notification is sent by the receiver to the sender using a Slice Loss Indication (SLI) packet. This is a fairly technical part of how codecs work and while the higher this value is, the more errors occurred in the stream, generally most of the time this value is only interesting to very intensively hardcore media developers.
trans-unit.target: 接收方通知发送方一个或多个连续(按扫描顺序)编码的视频宏块丢失或损坏的次数;该通知由接收方使用片断丢失指示(SLI)包发送给发送方。这是编解码器工作中相当技术性的部分,虽然这个值越高,流中发生的错误就越多,但一般来说,大多数时候这个值只对非常密集的硬核媒体开发人员感兴趣。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the receiving end of the stream sent a Picture Loss Indiciation (PLI) packet to the sender, indicating that it has lost some amount of encoded video data for one or more frames. Only the receiver has this value, and it's only valid for video tracks.
trans-unit.target: 流的接收端向发送端发送Picture Loss Indiciation (PLI)数据包的次数,表示它已经丢失了一帧或多帧的某种数量的编码视频数据。只有接收端才有这个值,而且它只对视频轨道有效。

trans-unit.source: The number of times this animation has looped, starting from 0. Returns null if the animation is not running or its KeyframeEffect isn't associated with an Animation.
trans-unit.target: 此动画从 0 开始循环播放的次数。如果动画没有运行或其动画的 KeyframeEffect 没有与 Animation 关联，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The number of times to move the cursor forward.
trans-unit.target: 向前移动光标的次数。

trans-unit.source: The number of touch points in touchList.
trans-unit.target: touchList 中的接触点数。

trans-unit.source: The number of tracks in the list.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的曲目数量。

trans-unit.source: The number records to return. If this value exceeds the number of records in the query, the browser will only retrieve the first item. If it is lower than 0 or greater than 232-1 a TypeError exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的号码记录。如果此值超过查询中的记录数，则浏览器将仅检索第一项。如果它低于 0 或大于 232-1 一个 TypeError 会抛出异常。

trans-unit.source: The object URL is a string identifying the File object. Each time you call window.URL.createObjectURL(), a unique object URL is created even if you've created an object URL for that file already. Each of these must be released. While they are released automatically when the document is unloaded, if your page uses them dynamically you should release them explicitly by calling window.URL.revokeObjectURL():
trans-unit.target: 对象URL是标识 File 对象的字符串。每次调用 window.URL.createObjectURL() 时，即使已经为该文件创建了对象URL，也会创建一个唯一的对象URL。这些都必须释放。尽管它们在文档卸载时自动释放，但是如果页面动态使用它们，则应通过调用 window.URL.revokeObjectURL() 显式释放它们：

trans-unit.source: The object can not be cloned. (Legacy code value: 25 and legacy constant name: DATA_CLONE_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 无法克隆对象。（旧版代码值： 25 ，旧版常量名称： DATA_CLONE_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object cannot be found here. (Legacy code value: 8 and legacy constant name: NOT_FOUND_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 在此找不到对象。（旧版代码值： 8 ，旧版常量名称： NOT_FOUND_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object cannot be modified in this way. (Legacy code value: 13 and legacy constant name: INVALID_MODIFICATION_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 无法以这种方式修改对象。（旧版代码值： 13 ，旧版常量名称： INVALID_MODIFICATION_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object cannot be modified. (Legacy code value: 7 and legacy constant name: NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 无法修改对象。（旧版代码值： 7 和旧版常量名称： NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object does not support the operation or argument. (Legacy code value: 15 and legacy constant name: INVALID_ACCESS_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 该对象不支持该操作或参数。（旧版代码值： 15 ，旧版常量名称： INVALID_ACCESS_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object is an RTCIceCandidateStats object containing statistics about the remote candidate's RTCIceTransport. This may include information such as the type of network, the protocol, the URL, the type of relay being used, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 该对象是 RTCIceCandidateStats 对象，其中包含有关远程候选者的 RTCIceTransport 的统计信息。这可能包括诸如网络类型，协议，URL，所使用的中继类型等信息。

trans-unit.source: The object is in an invalid state. (Legacy code value: 11 and legacy constant name: INVALID_STATE_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 该对象处于无效状态。（旧版代码值： 11 和旧版常量名称： INVALID_STATE_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object is in the wrong Document. (Legacy code value: 4 and legacy constant name: WRONG_DOCUMENT_ERR)
trans-unit.target: 对象在错误的 Document 中。（旧版代码值： 4 ，旧版常量名称： WRONG_DOCUMENT_ERR ）

trans-unit.source: The object is one of the types based on RTCMediaHandlerStats: for audio tracks, the type is RTCSenderAudioTrackAttachmentStats and for video tracks, the type is RTCSenderVideoTrackAttachmentStats. The data within provides statistics related to a particular MediaStreamTrack's attachment to an RTCRtpSender; also included are the media level metrics that go along with the track.
trans-unit.target: 该对象是基于 RTCMediaHandlerStats 的类型之一：对于音频轨道，类型为 RTCSenderAudioTrackAttachmentStats ；对于视频轨道，类型为 RTCSenderVideoTrackAttachmentStats 。其中的数据提供与特定 MediaStreamTrack 附加到 RTCRtpSender 的统计信息；还包括轨道附带的媒体级别指标。

trans-unit.source: The object passed from the other window.
trans-unit.target: 从其他窗口传来的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object retrieved by getImageData() has a width of 200 and a height of 100, for a total of 20,000 pixels. Of those pixels, most are either transparent or taken from off the canvas; only 5,000 of them are opaque black (the color of the drawn rectangle).
trans-unit.target: 通过 getImageData() 检索的对象的宽度为200，高度为100，总共20,000个像素。在这些像素中，大多数是透明的或从画布上获取的。其中只有5,000个是不透明的黑色（绘制矩形的颜色）。

trans-unit.source: The object store auto increments.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储自动增量。

trans-unit.source: The object store does not auto increment.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储不会自动递增。

trans-unit.source: The object store has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储已被删除。

trans-unit.source: The object store uses in-line keys but no key generator, and the object store's key path does not yield a valid key.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储使用在线密钥,但没有密钥生成器,对象存储的密钥路径不能产生有效密钥。

trans-unit.source: The object store uses in-line keys or has a key generator, and a key parameter was provided.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储使用在线密钥或有密钥生成器,并提供了一个密钥参数。

trans-unit.source: The object store uses out-of-line keys and has no key generator, and no key parameter was provided.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储使用行外密钥,没有密钥生成器,也没有提供密钥参数。

trans-unit.source: The object store's transaction mode is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 对象存储的事务模式是只读。

trans-unit.source: The object to deliver to the main thread; this will be in the data field in the event delivered to the Worker.onmessage handler. This may be any value or JavaScript object handled by the structured clone algorithm, which includes cyclical references.
trans-unit.target: 传递给主线程的对象；这将在传递给 Worker.onmessage 处理程序的事件的数据字段中。这可以是结构化克隆算法处理的任何值或JavaScript对象，包括循环引用。

trans-unit.source: The object to deliver to the worker; this will be in the data field in the event delivered to the DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.onmessage handler. This may be any value or JavaScript object handled by the structured clone algorithm, which includes cyclical references.
trans-unit.target: 交付给工人的对象；这将在传递给 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.onmessage 处理程序的事件的数据字段中。这可以是结构化克隆算法处理的任何值或JavaScript对象，包括循环引用。

trans-unit.source: The object which receives a notification (an object that implements the Event interface) when an event of the specified type occurs. This must be an object implementing the EventListener interface, or a JavaScript function. See The event listener callback for details on the callback itself.
trans-unit.target: 当指定类型的事件发生时，接收通知的对象（实现 Event 接口的对象）。这必须是实现 EventListener 接口的对象，或者是JavaScript 函数。有关回调本身的详细信息，请参见事件侦听器回调。

trans-unit.source: The observer, adObserver, is created by calling IntersectionObserver's constructor, passing in the callback function, intersectionCallback, and our options.
trans-unit.target: 观察者 adObserver 是通过调用 IntersectionObserver 的构造函数并传入回调函数， intersectionCallback 和我们的选项来创建的。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete Document interface's fullscreen read-only property reports whether or not the document is currently displaying content in full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 Document 界面的 fullscreen 只读属性报告当前文档是否以全屏模式显示内容。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete XMLHttpRequest method sendAsBinary() is a variant of the send() method that sends binary data. The send() method now supports binary data and should now be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 XMLHttpRequest 方法 sendAsBinary() 是发送二进制数据的 send() 方法的变体。所述 send() 方法现在支持二进制数据，并且现在应被代替使用。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTMLFontElement.size property is a DOMString that reflects the size HTML attribute. It contains either an integer number in the range of 1-7 or a relative value to increase/decrease the value of the size attribute of the <basefont> element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 HTMLFontElement.size 属性是一个 DOMString ，它反映了HTML属性的 size 。它包含一个1-7范围内的整数或一个用于增加/减小 <basefont> 元素的 size 属性值的相对值。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTMLFontElement.color property is a DOMString that reflects the color HTML attribute, containing either a named color or a color specified in the hexadecimal #RRGGBB format.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 HTMLFontElement .color 属性是 DOMString ，它反映了HTML color 属性，其中包含命名的颜色或以十六进制#RRGGBB格式指定的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTMLFontElement.face property is a DOMString that reflects the face HTML attribute, containing a comma-separated list of one or more font names.
trans-unit.target: HTMLFontElement .face 属性是一个过时的 DOMString ，它反映了 face HTML属性，其中包含一个或多个字体名称的逗号分隔列表。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete supportedTypes property of the BasicCardRequest dictionary can optionally be provided to specify an array of DOMStrings representing the card types that the retailer supports (e.g. credit, debit, prepaid).
trans-unit.target: 可以选择提供 BasicCardRequest 字典的过时的 supportedTypes 属性，以指定表示零售商支持的卡类型的 DOMString 数组（例如， credit ， debit ， prepaid ）。

trans-unit.source: The of the organization that manufactured the USB device.
trans-unit.target: 制造USB设备的组织的。

trans-unit.source: The offer sent by the remote peer has been applied and an answer has been created (usually by calling RTCPeerConnection.createAnswer()) and applied by calling RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription(). This provisional answer describes the supported media formats and so forth, but may not have a complete set of ICE candidates included. Further candidates will be delivered separately later.
trans-unit.target: 已应用了远程对等方发送的要约，并创建了一个答案（通常通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.createAnswer() ），并通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 来应用。此临时答案描述了受支持的媒体格式等，但可能未包含完整的ICE候选集。其他候选人将在以后另行交付。

trans-unit.source: The offer sent by the remote peer has been applied and an answer has been created (usually by calling RTCPeerConnection.createAnswer()) and applied by calling RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription(). This provisional answer describes the supported media formats and so forth, but may not have a complete set of ICE candidates included. Further candidates will be delivered separately later.
trans-unit.target: 已应用了远程对等方发送的要约，并创建了一个答案（通常通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.createAnswer() ），并通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 来应用。此临时答案描述了受支持的媒体格式等，但可能未包含完整的ICE候选集。其他候选人将在以后另行交付。

trans-unit.source: The offer/answer process is performed both when a call is first established, but also any time the call's format or other configuration needs to change. Regardless of whether it's a new call, or reconfiguring an existing one, these are the basic steps which must occur to exchange the offer and answer, leaving out the ICE layer for the moment:
trans-unit.target: 无论是在呼叫刚建立时,还是在呼叫的格式或其他配置需要改变时,都要进行交换提议/应答的过程。不管是新的呼叫,还是重新配置现有的呼叫,这些都是交换要约和应答必须发生的基本步骤,暂时不考虑ICE层。

trans-unit.source: The official usg.org-assigned vendor ID.
trans-unit.target: usg.org指定的官方供应商ID。

trans-unit.source: The offset in node to which the selection will be collapsed. If not specified, the default value 0 is used.
trans-unit.target: 选择将折叠到的 node 偏移量。如果未指定，则使用默认值 0 。

trans-unit.source: The offset into Node of the point to compare with the Range.
trans-unit.target: 与 Range 进行比较的点到 Node 的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The offset is added before the depth test is performed and before the value is written into the depth buffer.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量是在进行深度测试之前和将值写入深度缓冲区之前添加的。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the keyframe specified as a number between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive or null. This is equivalent to specifying start and end states in percentages in CSS stylesheets using @keyframes. If this value is null or missing, the keyframe will be evenly spaced between adjacent keyframes.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的偏移量，指定为 0.0 到 1.0 之间的一个数字，包括 null 或null。这等效于使用 @keyframes 在CSS样式表中以百分比指定开始和结束状态。如果此值为 null 或缺失，则关键帧将在相邻关键帧之间均匀间隔。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the keyframe specified as a number between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive or null. trans-unit.source: The one value that needs explaining is the vertical offset position we are drawing each bar at: HEIGHT-barHeight/2. I am doing this because I want each bar to stick up from the bottom of the canvas, not down from the top, as it would if we set the vertical position to 0. Therefore, we instead set the vertical position each time to the height of the canvas minus barHeight/2, so therefore each bar will be drawn from partway down the canvas, down to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 需要说明的一个值是我们在以下位置绘制每个条的垂直偏移位置： HEIGHT-barHeight/2 。之所以这样做，是因为我希望每个条都从画布的底部向上而不是从顶部向下，就像我们将垂直位置设置为0一样。因此，我们每次都将垂直位置设置为高度减去 barHeight/2 的值，因此每个条都将从画布的中途绘制到底部。

trans-unit.source: The opcode field defines how to interpret the payload data: 0x0 for continuation,0x1 for text (which is always encoded in UTF-8), 0x2 for binary, and other so-called "control codes" that will be discussed later. In this version of WebSockets, 0x3 to 0x7 and 0xB to 0xF have no meaning.
trans-unit.target: 操作码字段定义如何解释有效载荷数据：0x0表示连续， 0x1 表示文本（始终以UTF-8编码）， 0x2 表示二进制，以及其他所谓的“控制代码”，稍后将进行讨论。在此版本的WebSocket中， 0x3 至 0x7 和 0xB 至 0xF 没有意义。

trans-unit.source: The open request doesn't open the database or start the transaction right away. The call to the open() function returns an IDBOpenDBRequest object with a result (success) or error value that you handle as an event. Most other asynchronous functions in IndexedDB do the same thing - return an IDBRequest object with the result or error. The result for the open function is an instance of an IDBDatabase.
trans-unit.target: 打开请求不会立即打开数据库或启动事务。对 open() 函数的调用返回一个 IDBOpenDBRequest 对象，该对象带有您作为事件处理的结果（成功）或错误值。IndexedDB中的大多数其他异步函数执行相同的操作-返回带有结果或错误的 IDBRequest 对象。open函数的结果是 IDBDatabase. 的实例。

trans-unit.source: The operation by which reading and writing on a database is done. Every request represents one read or write operation.
trans-unit.target: 对数据库进行读写的操作。每一个请求代表一个读或写操作。

trans-unit.source: The operation cannot be performed on the current state of the interface object. For example, the state that was cached in an interface object has changed since it was last read from disk.
trans-unit.target: 不能对接口对象的当前状态进行操作。例如,自从上次从磁盘上读取接口对象的状态后,接口对象中缓存的状态就发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: The operation couldn't be completed at this time because no synthesis engine was available (For example, the user may need to install or configure a synthesis engine.)
trans-unit.target: 由于没有合成引擎,此时无法完成操作(例如,用户可能需要安装或配置合成引擎)。

trans-unit.source: The operation couldn't be completed at this time because some required network communication failed.
trans-unit.target: 由于一些所需的网络通信失败,此时操作无法完成。

trans-unit.source: The operation couldn't be completed at this time because the user-agent couldn't identify an audio output device (for example, the user may need to connect a speaker or configure system settings.)

trans-unit.source: The order that matrices are multiplied in matters. When multiplying numbers a * b = c, and b * a = c are both true. For example 3 * 4 = 12, and 4 * 3 = 12. In math these numbers would be described as commutative. Matrices are not guaranteed to be the same if the order is switched, so matrices are non-commutative.
trans-unit.target: 矩阵乘以物质的顺序。将数字相乘时，a * b = c和b * a = c都为真。例如3 * 4 = 12和4 * 3 =12。在数学上，这些数字将被描述为可交换的。如果切换顺序，则矩阵不能保证相同，因此矩阵是不可交换的。

trans-unit.source: The orientation and position value are set and retrieved using different syntaxes, since they're stored as AudioParam values. trans-unit.source: The parameter passed into the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onfetch handler, FetchEvent represents a fetch action that is dispatched on the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope of a ServiceWorker. It contains information about the request and resulting response, and provides the FetchEvent.respondWith() method, which allows us to provide an arbitrary response back to the controlled page.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onfetch 处理程序的参数 FetchEvent 表示在 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope 的 ServiceWorker GlobalScope上分派的提取操作。它包含有关请求和结果响应的信息，并提供 FetchEvent.respondWith() 方法，该方法使我们能够向受控页面提供任意响应。

trans-unit.source: The parameter passed into the oninstall handler, the InstallEvent interface represents an install action that is dispatched on the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope of a ServiceWorker. As a child of ExtendableEvent, it ensures that functional events such as FetchEvent are not dispatched during installation.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 oninstall 处理程序的参数 InstallEvent 接口表示在 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope 的 ServiceWorker GlobalScope上分派的安装操作。作为 ExtendableEvent 的子级，它确保在安装过程中不会调度诸如 FetchEvent 之类的功能事件。

trans-unit.source: The parameter passed into the onnotificationclick handler, the NotificationEvent interface represents a notification click event that is dispatched on the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope of a ServiceWorker.

trans-unit.source: The performance tool's flame chart and call tree tabs provide data to help analyze the site's JavaScript usage. The call tree shows where the application is spending most of its time, whereas the flame chart shows the state of the JavaScript stack for the code at every millisecond during the performance profile. This provides a way to know exactly which function was executing at any point during the recording, how long it ran, and where it was called from.
trans-unit.target: 性能工具的明火图和调用树选项卡提供了数据，以帮助分析站点的JavaScript使用情况。调用树显示了应用程序大部分时间在哪里使用，而火焰图显示了性能配置文件中每毫秒的代码的JavaScript堆栈状态。这提供了一种方法，可以准确地知道在录制过程中的任何时候哪个函数正在执行，运行了多长时间以及从何处调用了该函数。

trans-unit.source: The position and size feature elements require a number to be set. The toolbars and window functionalities can be set with a yes or no; you can use 1 instead of yes and 0 instead of no. The toolbar and functionality feature elements also accept the shorthand form: you can turn a feature on by simply listing the feature name in the features string. If you supply the features parameter, then the titlebar and close are still yes by default, but the other features which have a yes/no choice will be no by default and will be turned off.

trans-unit.source: The position variable was defined in the draw() method and passed in as an attribute to the shader. This is a three dimensional point, but the gl_Position variable that ends up getting passed down through the pipeline is actually 4 dimensional — instead of (x,y,z) it is (x,y,z,w). There is no letter after z, so for convention this fourth dimension is labeled w. In the above example the w coordinate is being set to 1.0. The obvious question is "why the extra dimension?" It turns out that this addition allows for lots of nice techniques for manipulating 3D data.
trans-unit.target: 位置变量在 draw() 方法中定义，并作为属性传递给着色器。这是一个三维点，但是最终通过管道传递的 gl_Position 变量实际上是4维的-而不是 (x,y,z) 是 (x,y,z,w) 。 z后面没有字母，因此习惯上将此第四维标记为w。在上面的示例中，w坐标设置为1.0。显而易见的问题是“为什么要增加维度？”事实证明，这种添加允许使用许多不错的技术来处理3D数据。

trans-unit.source: The position, forward, and up value are set and retrieved using different syntaxes. Retrieval is done by accessing, for example, AudioListener.positionX, while setting the same property is done with AudioListener.positionX.value. This is why these values are not marked read only, which is how they appear in the specification's IDL.
trans-unit.target: 使用不同的语法设置和检索位置，正向和向上值。检索是通过访问例如 AudioListener.positionX 来完成的，而设置相同的属性是通过 AudioListener.positionX.value 来完成的。这就是为什么这些值未标记为只读的原因，这就是它们在规范的IDL中出现的方式。

trans-unit.source: The previous attempt — AppCache — seemed to be a good idea because it allowed you to specify assets to cache really easily. However, it made many assumptions about what you were trying to do and then broke horribly when your app didn’t follow those assumptions exactly. Read Jake Archibald's Application Cache is a Douchebag for more details.
trans-unit.target: 之前的尝试（AppCache）似乎是一个好主意，因为它使您可以指定要真正轻松缓存的资产。但是，它对您要执行的操作做出了许多假设，但是当您的应用未完全遵循这些假设时，它就惨败了。阅读Jake Archibald的Application Cache是​​Douchebag以获得更多详细信息。

trans-unit.target: 连接到WebSocket服务器,然后在连接上发送和接收数据的主要接口。

trans-unit.source: The primary interface for the Intersection Observer API. Provides methods for creating and managing an observer which can watch any number of target elements for the same intersection configuration. Each observer can asynchronously observe changes in the intersection between one or more target elements and a shared ancestor element or with their top-level Document's viewport. The ancestor or viewport is referred to as the root.
trans-unit.target: Intersection Observer API的主要接口。提供用于创建和管理观察者的方法，该观察者可以监视相同交集配置的任意数量的目标元素。每个观察者都可以异步观察一个或多个目标元素与共享祖先元素之间的交集或它们的顶级 Document 的视口中的变化。祖先或视口称为root。

trans-unit.source: The primary interface is the PointerEvent interface which has a constructor plus several event types and associated global event handlers. The standard also includes some extensions to the Element and Navigator interfaces. The following sub-sections contain short descriptions of each interface and property.
trans-unit.target: 主要接口是 PointerEvent 接口，该接口具有 constructor 以及几种事件类型和关联的全局事件处理程序。该标准还包括对 Element 和 Navigator 接口的一些扩展。以下小节包含每个接口和属性的简短描述。

trans-unit.target: 实现MediaStream Recording API的主要接口。

trans-unit.source: The primary key of the record you want to update (e.g. from IDBCursor.primaryKey). This is only needed for object stores that have an autoIncrement primary key, therefore the key is not in a field on the record object. In such cases, calling put(item) will always insert a new record, because it doesn't know what existing record you might want to modify.
trans-unit.target: 您要更新的记录的主键（例如，从 IDBCursor.primaryKey ）。只有具有 autoIncrement 主键的对象存储才需要此操作，因此该键不在记录对象的字段中。在这种情况下，调用 put(item) 将始终插入新记录，因为它不知道您可能要修改哪些现有记录。

trans-unit.source: The primary key to position the cursor at.

trans-unit.source: The primary purpose for WebRTC's DTMF support is to allow WebRTC-based communication clients to be connected to a public-switched telephone network (PSTN) or other legacy telephone service, including extant voice over IP (VoIP) services. For that reason, DTMF can't be used between two WebRTC-based devices, because there is no mechanism provided by WebRTC for receiving DTMF codes.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC的DTMF支持的主要目的是允许基于WebRTC的通信客户端连接到公共交换电话网络（PSTN）或其他传统电话服务，包括现存的IP语音（VoIP）服务。因此，无法在两个基于WebRTC的设备之间使用DTMF，因为WebRTC没有提供用于接收DTMF代码的机制。

trans-unit.source: The primary reason for this interface to exist was to add a stop() method to its MediaStream parent interface. However, control over playback of media has been moved to the individual MediaStreamTrack objects, so this is no longer necessary. Instead, media is stopped by calling MediaStreamTrack.stop() on each track that needs to be stopped. The example for MediaStreamTrack.stop() demonstrates how to stop a multi-track stream, which is what LocalMediaStream.stop() used to be used for.
trans-unit.target: 该接口存在的主要原因是向其 MediaStream 父接口添加一个 stop() 方法。但是，对媒体播放的控制已移至各个 MediaStreamTrack 对象，因此不再需要。而是通过在每个需要停止的轨道上调用 MediaStreamTrack.stop() 来停止媒体。对于例如 MediaStreamTrack.stop() 演示了如何停止多轨流，这是什么 LocalMediaStream.stop() 用于使用。

trans-unit.source: The prioritization of the properties is simple: if two properties' requested values are mutually exclusive, then the one listed first in the constraint set will be used. As an example, if the browser running the code above couldn't provide a 1920x1080 track but could do 1920x900, then that's what would be provided.
trans-unit.target: 属性的优先级很简单:如果两个属性的请求值是互斥的,那么将使用约束集中最先列出的那个。举个例子,如果运行上面代码的浏览器不能提供1920x1080的轨道,但可以做到1920x900,那么就会提供这个。

trans-unit.source: The priority is the number after the protocol, so it's the fourth field in the candidate string. In this example, the priority is 2043278322.
trans-unit.target: 优先级是协议后面的数字,所以它是候选字符串中的第四个字段。在本例中,优先级是2043278322。

trans-unit.source: The problem
trans-unit.target: 问题

trans-unit.source: The problem for users is that each individual computer on the Internet no longer necessarily has a unique IP address, and, in fact, each device’s IP address may change not only if they move from one network to another, but if their network’s address is changed by NAT and/or DHCP. For developers trying to do peer-to-peer networking, this introduces a conundrum: without a unique identifier for every user device, it’s not possible to instantly and automatically know how to connect to a specific device on the Internet. Even though you know who you want to talk to, you don’t necessarily know how to reach them or even what their address is.
trans-unit.target: 用户面临的问题是Internet上的每台计算机都不再必须具有唯一的IP地址，并且实际上，每台设备的IP地址不仅会在它们从一个网络移动到另一个网络时发生变化，而且其网络地址也会发生变化通过NAT和/或DHCP。对于试图进行点对点联网的开发人员，这带来了一个难题：没有每个用户设备的唯一标识符，就不可能立即自动知道如何连接到Internet上的特定设备。即使您知道要与谁交谈，也不一定知道如何联系他们甚至他们的地址是什么。

trans-unit.source: The problem with this method is that only one handler can be set per element and per event.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法的问题是每个元素和每个事件只能设置一个处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The process of aborting any ongoing activities will cause any outstanding Promises returned by play() being resolved or rejected as appropriate based on their status before the loading of new media can begin. Pending play promises are aborted with an "AbortError"DOMException.
trans-unit.target: 中止任何正在进行的活动的过程将导致 play() 返回的所有未完成 Promise 会根据其状态在开始加载新媒体之前根据情况被解决或拒绝。待执行的游戏承诺会因 "AbortError" DOMException 中止。

trans-unit.source: The process of changing descriptions actually involves intermediary steps handled by the WebRTC layer to ensure that an active connection can be changed without losing the connection if the change does not succeed. See Pending and current descriptions in WebRTC connectivity for more details on this process.
trans-unit.target: 更改描述的过程实际上涉及由WebRTC层处理的中间步骤，以确保可以更改活动连接而不丢失连接（如果更改不成功）。见挂起和当前的描述中的WebRTC连接上这个过程的更多细节。

trans-unit.source: The process of closing the underlying data transport has begun. It is no longer possible to queue new messages to be sent, but previously queued messages may still be send or received before entering the "closed" state.
trans-unit.target: 关闭基础数据传输的过程已经开始。不再可能将要发送的新消息放入队列中，但是先前进入队列的消息在进入 "closed" 状态之前仍可以发送或接收。

trans-unit.source: The process of negotiating a connection between two peers involves exchanging RTCSessionDescription objects back and forth, with each description suggesting one combination of connection configuration options that the sender of the description supports. Once the two peers agree upon a configuration for the connection, negotiation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 协商两个对等方之间的连接的过程涉及来回交换 RTCSessionDescription 对象，每个描述都建议该描述的发送者支持的连接配置选项的一种组合。一旦两个对等方就连接的配置达成一致，则协商完成。

trans-unit.source: The progress box uses a <progress> element to show the progress, along with a label with sections that are changed to present numeric information about the progress. In addition, there's a "Start" button (creatively given the ID "startButton"), which the user will use to start the data processing.
trans-unit.target: 进度框使用 <progress> 元素显示进度，以及带有更改部分的标签以显示有关进度的数字信息。另外，还有一个“开始”按钮（其ID为“ startButton”），用户将使用该按钮开始数据处理。

trans-unit.source: The progress event handler, specified by the updateProgress() function in this example, receives the total number of bytes to transfer as well as the number of bytes transferred so far in the event's total and loaded fields. However, if the lengthComputable field is false, the total length is not known and will be zero.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，由 updateProgress() 函数指定的进度事件处理程序在事件的 total 和 loaded 字段中接收要传输的字节总数以及到目前为止已传输的字节数。但是，如果 lengthComputable 字段为false，则总长度未知，将为零。

trans-unit.target: 承诺处理程序接收传入连接的数组作为其输入参数。我们使用 forEach() 遍历这些对象，将每个连接的新项添加到 connectionView 列表元素。

trans-unit.source: The promise rejects with a NotSupportedError if the user agent does not support the payment methods specified when the PaymentRequest constructor was called.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户代理不支持调用 PaymentRequest 构造函数时指定的付款方式，则Promise会拒绝并带有 NotSupportedError 。

trans-unit.source: The promise rejects with a SecurityError if the call to show() was not in response to a user action, such as a click or keyup event. Other reasons a SecurityError may be thrown are at the discretion of the user agent, and may include situations such as too many calls to show() being made in a short time or show() being called while payment requests are blocked by parental controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果对 show() 的调用未响应用户操作（例如 click 或 keyup 事件），则Promise会拒绝并显示 SecurityError 。可能引发 SecurityError 的其他原因由用户代理决定，并且可能包括诸如在短时间内进行太多对 show() 的调用或在家长控制阻止付款请求时调用 show() 的情况。

trans-unit.source: The promise rejects with an InvalidStateError if the same payment has already been shown for this request (its state is interactive because it is being shown already).
trans-unit.target: 如果已经为该请求显示了相同的付款，则 InvalidStateError 拒绝并显示InvalidStateError（其状态是 interactive 因为已经显示了该状态）。

trans-unit.source: The properties shadowOffsetX and shadowOffsetY indicate how far the shadow should extend from the object in the X and Y directions; these values aren't affected by the current transformation matrix.
